thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Sylvie

author: Sylvie
title: Sylvie
text:
I always order the labels for my children through mabel labels and I've never been disapointed.
They are not only cute and unique they are amazing quality. Ever lasting. I've had labels on utensils for 5 yrs now since my oldest started school. They've been through it all including the dishwasher time and time again and they still look like new.
Love the labels, love the service and quick delivery.
Thank you Mabel's labels.
